name: Night Shift (itch) (blonk)
description:
Quick post-jam release notes;

Increased movement speed

Made keyboard controls feel more responsive

Controls:

Arrow keys - movement

Spacebar - interact with things, close dialogues

Night shift is a game built in a new YN-style engine that's entirely web based, developed as part of Dream Diary Jam 2. You'll see bits of dialogue and stuff that would have contributed to the story of the game, I totally ran out of time to flesh that out (and do half decent art for that matter). Hopefully the potential is visible in the engine and the game!

Some forewarnings:

No effects in this initial build

There's no way to wake up
